channel.title: Coordinates/Run
channel.description:
-My server didnt have coordinates under the run, so i put it in, but they dont change, if i log on, itll tell me what my coords are, but when i move they dont change, no i'd have to keep logging in and out to add things. :confused:
-Also my run doesnt increase/decrease, does anyone know how i make it do so?? :confused:
Helps appriciated ;D

item.title: Coordinates/Run
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

and how the heck do i do that?

My server base is runescape blitz 2.75[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2007, 02:54:02 PM[/size][hr]Can someone post theres from there server or something?? i rly want my coords to change so i can start editing my server =D

Read full topic

item.title: Coordinates/Run
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

You need to call it under boolean process so it changes every 500 ms.

Read full topic
